text: Abimelech returned to Arumah, and Zebul drove Gaal and his kin away so that they could no longer remain at Shechem.
The sons of Micah were Pithon, Melech, Tahrea, and Ahaz.
Thus the wedding was turned into mourning, and the sound of their music into lamentation.
Anyone who gives you a cup of water to drink because you belong to Christ, amen, I say to you, will surely not lose his reward.
Jesus said in reply, “O faithless and perverse generation, how long will I be with you and endure you? Bring your son here.”
Jesus said to them, “If you were blind, you would have no sin; but now you are saying, ‘We see,’ so your sin remains.
He gave her his hand and raised her up, and when he had called the holy ones and the widows, he presented her alive.
